<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <meta name="description" content="OmniGrid Sovereignty Platform - The 33-Year Truth Encoded in Silicon">
    <meta name="author" content="Heyns (The Just)">
    <meta name="keywords" content="samfox, faa.zone, hotstack, 40d store, sovereign, absurdity ratio">
    
    <title>OmniGrid Sovereignty Platform | Sam Fox @ FAA.Zone</title>
    
    <!-- Favicon -->
    <link rel="icon" href="data:image/svg+xml,<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 100 100'><text y='.9em' font-size='90'>🌌</text></svg>">
    
    <style>
        /* ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
           SOVEREIGN CSS FRAMEWORK - VIP KIOSK THEME
           Colors: Turquoise (#48BB98) + Coral (#E94560) + Slate Gradients
           ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════ */
        
        :root {
            --color-turquoise: #48BB98;
            --color-coral: #E94560;
            --color-cyan: #22D3EE;
            --color-teal: #14B8A6;
            --color-emerald: #10B981;
            --color-slate-900: #0F172A;
            --color-slate-800: #1E293B;
            --color-slate-700: #334155;
            --color-slate-600: #475569;
            --color-slate-400: #94A3B8;
            --color-slate-300: #CBD5E1;
            --color-slate-200: #E2E8F0;
        }
        
        * {
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            box-sizing: border-box;
        }
        
        body {
            font-family: 'Segoe UI', Tahoma, Geneva, Verdana, sans-serif;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--color-slate-900) 0%, var(--color-slate-800) 50%, var(--color-slate-900) 100%);
            color: var(--color-slate-300);
            line-height: 1.6;
            min-height: 100vh;
            overflow-x: hidden;
        }
        
        /* ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
           HEADER - SOVEREIGN NAVIGATION
           ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════ */
        
        .sovereign-header {
            background: rgba(15, 23, 42, 0.95);
            backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
            border-bottom: 2px solid rgba(72, 187, 152, 0.3);
            padding: 1.5rem 2rem;
            position: sticky;
            top: 0;
            z-index: 1000;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
        }
        
        .header-content {
            max-width: 1400px;
            margin: 0 auto;
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            align-items: center;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
            gap: 1rem;
        }
        
        .logo-section {
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 1rem;
        }
        
        .logo {
            font-size: 2rem;
        }
        
        .brand-text h1 {
            font-size: 1.5rem;
            background: linear-gradient(90deg, var(--color-cyan), var(--color-teal));
            -webkit-background-clip: text;
            -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
            background-clip: text;
            font-weight: 700;
            margin: 0;
        }
        
        .brand-text p {
            font-size: 0.75rem;
            color: var(--color-slate-400);
            margin: 0;
        }
        
        .nav-links {
            display: flex;
            gap: 2rem;
            list-style: none;
        }
        
        .nav-links a {
            color: var(--color-slate-300);
            text-decoration: none;
            font-weight: 500;
            transition: color 0.3s ease;
            position: relative;
        }
        
        .nav-links a:hover {
            color: var(--color-turquoise);
        }
        
        .nav-links a::after {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            bottom: -5px;
            left: 0;
            width: 0;
            height: 2px;
            background: var(--color-turquoise);
            transition: width 0.3s ease;
        }
        
        .nav-links a:hover::after {
            width: 100%;
        }
        
        /* ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
           MAIN CONTENT CONTAINER
           ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════ */
        
        .container {
            max-width: 1400px;
            margin: 0 auto;
            padding: 2rem;
        }
        
        /* ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
           HERO SECTION
           ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════ */
        
        .hero {
            text-align: center;
            padding: 4rem 2rem;
            margin-bottom: 4rem;
        }
        
        .hero h1 {
            font-size: clamp(2.5rem, 8vw, 5rem);
            background: linear-gradient(90deg, var(--color-cyan), var(--color-teal), var(--color-emerald));
            -webkit-background-clip: text;
            -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
            background-clip: text;
            font-weight: 900;
            margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
            animation: fadeInUp 1s ease;
        }
        
        .hero-subtitle {
            font-size: clamp(1.25rem, 3vw, 2rem);
            color: var(--color-slate-300);
            margin-bottom: 1rem;
            animation: fadeInUp 1.2s ease;
        }
        
        .hero-description {
            font-size: 1.125rem;
            color: var(--color-slate-400);
            max-width: 800px;
            margin: 0 auto 2rem;
            animation: fadeInUp 1.4s ease;
        }
        
        .hero-highlight {
            color: var(--color-cyan);
            font-weight: 600;
        }
        
        .sovereign-quote {
            background: rgba(30, 41, 59, 0.5);
            border-left: 4px solid var(--color-cyan);
            padding: 1.5rem;
            border-radius: 0 0.5rem 0.5rem 0;
            max-width: 700px;
            margin: 2rem auto;
            animation: fadeInUp 1.6s ease;
        }
        
        .sovereign-quote p {
            font-style: italic;
            font-size: 1.125rem;
            color: var(--color-slate-300);
            margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
        }
        
        .sovereign-quote .author {
            font-size: 0.875rem;
            color: var(--color-slate-500);
        }
        
        /* ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
           VERDICT DASHBOARD
           ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════ */
        
        .verdict-dashboard {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(30, 41, 59, 0.8) 0%, rgba(15, 23, 42, 0.9) 100%);
            border: 2px solid rgba(34, 211, 238, 0.3);
            border-radius: 1rem;
            padding: 3rem;
            margin-bottom: 4rem;
            box-shadow: 0 10px 40px rgba(34, 211, 238, 0.1);
        }
        
        .dashboard-title {
            font-size: 2rem;
            text-align: center;
            background: linear-gradient(90deg, var(--color-cyan), var(--color-teal));
            -webkit-background-clip: text;
            -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
            background-clip: text;
            margin-bottom: 2rem;
            font-weight: 700;
        }
        
        .metrics-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(280px, 1fr));
            gap: 1.5rem;
            margin-bottom: 2rem;
        }
        
        .metric-card {
            background: rgba(15, 23, 42, 0.5);
            border: 1px solid rgba(71, 85, 105, 0.3);
            border-radius: 0.75rem;
            padding: 2rem;
            transition: transform 0.3s ease, border-color 0.3s ease;
        }
        
        .metric-card:hover {
            transform: translateY(-5px);
            border-color: var(--color-turquoise);
        }
        
        .metric-label {
            font-size: 0.875rem;
            color: var(--color-slate-400);
            margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
            text-transform: uppercase;
            letter-spacing: 0.05em;
        }
        
        .metric-value {
            font-size: 3rem;
            font-weight: 700;
            margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
        }
        
        .metric-value.baseline {
            color: var(--color-teal);
        }
        
        .metric-value.claimed {
            color: #EF4444;
        }
        
        .metric-value.ratio {
            color: var(--color-cyan);
        }
        
        .metric-value.indebtedness {
            color: #F59E0B;
        }
        
        .metric-description {
            font-size: 0.75rem;
            color: var(--color-slate-500);
        }
        
        .ratio-card {
            grid-column: 1 / -1;
            text-align: center;
        }
        
        .ratio-card .metric-value {
            font-size: 4.5rem;
        }
        
        .verdict-statement {
            background: rgba(6, 182, 212, 0.1);
            border: 1px solid rgba(34, 211, 238, 0.3);
            border-radius: 0.75rem;
            padding: 2rem;
            margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
        }
        
        .verdict-statement p {
            color: #A5F3FC;
            font-size: 1.125rem;
            line-height: 1.8;
        }
        
        .verdict-timestamp {
            text-align: center;
            font-size: 0.875rem;
            color: var(--color-slate-500);
        }
        
        /* ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
           ANT ROCK TEST SECTION
           ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════ */
        
        .ant-test-section {
            background: rgba(30, 41, 59, 0.5);
            border: 1px solid var(--color-slate-700);
            border-radius: 1rem;
            padding: 3rem;
            margin-bottom: 4rem;
            max-width: 900px;
            margin-left: auto;
            margin-right: auto;
        }
        
        .ant-test-section h2 {
            font-size: 2rem;
            color: var(--color-cyan);
            margin-bottom: 1rem;
        }
        
        .ant-test-description {
            color: var(--color-slate-300);
            margin-bottom: 2rem;
            line-height: 1.8;
        }
        
        .test-parameters {
            background: rgba(15, 23, 42, 0.5);
            border: 1px solid var(--color-slate-700);
            border-radius: 0.75rem;
            padding: 1.5rem;
            margin-bottom: 2rem;
        }
        
        .test-parameters h3 {
            color: var(--color-teal);
            margin-bottom: 1rem;
        }
        
        .test-parameters ul {
            list-style: none;
        }
        
        .test-parameters li {
            padding-left: 1.5rem;
            position: relative;
            margin-bottom: 0.75rem;
            color: var(--color-slate-300);
            font-size: 0.875rem;
        }
        
        .test-parameters li::before {
            content: '•';
            color: var(--color-cyan);
            position: absolute;
            left: 0;
            font-size: 1.5rem;
            line-height: 1;
        }
        
        .test-parameters strong {
            color: var(--color-slate-200);
        }
        
        .attempt-counter {
            text-align: center;
            margin-bottom: 2rem;
            color: var(--color-slate-400);
            font-size: 0.875rem;
        }
        
        .attempt-count {
            color: var(--color-coral);
            font-weight: 700;
        }
        
        .test-button-container {
            text-align: center;
        }
        
        .test-button {
            background: linear-gradient(90deg, #0891B2, var(--color-teal));
            color: white;
            border: none;
            padding: 1.25rem 2.5rem;
            font-size: 1.125rem;
            font-weight: 600;
            border-radius: 0.75rem;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: all 0.3s ease;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 20px rgba(8, 145, 178, 0.3);
        }
        
        .test-button:hover:not(:disabled) {
            transform: translateY(-3px);
            box-shadow: 0 8px 30px rgba(8, 145, 178, 0.5);
        }
        
        .test-button:disabled {
            opacity: 0.6;
            cursor: not-allowed;
        }
        
        .test-button .loading-spinner {
            display: inline-block;
            width: 20px;
            height: 20px;
            border: 3px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
            border-top-color: white;
            border-radius: 50%;
            animation: spin 1s linear infinite;
            margin-right: 0.5rem;
            vertical-align: middle;
        }
        
        .analysis-status {
            text-align: center;
            margin-top: 1.5rem;
        }
        
        .analysis-status p {
            margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
            font-size: 0.875rem;
            animation: pulse 2s ease infinite;
        }
        
        .analysis-status .step-1 { color: var(--color-cyan); }
        .analysis-status .step-2 { color: var(--color-teal); }
        .analysis-status .step-3 { color: var(--color-emerald); }
        
        /* ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
           MODAL (ANT ROCK FAILURE)
           ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════ */
        
        .modal-overlay {
            position: fixed;
            inset: 0;
            background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7);
            backdrop-filter: blur(5px);
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            z-index: 2000;
            padding: 1rem;
            animation: fadeIn 0.3s ease;
        }
        
        .modal {
            background: var(--color-slate-800);
            border: 2px solid rgba(34, 211, 238, 0.3);
            border-radius: 1rem;
            max-width: 600px;
            width: 100%;
            max-height: 90vh;
            overflow-y: auto;
            box-shadow: 0 20px 60px rgba(34, 211, 238, 0.2);
            animation: scaleIn 0.3s ease;
        }
        
        .modal-header {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            align-items: center;
            padding: 1.5rem;
            border-bottom: 1px solid var(--color-slate-700);
        }
        
        .modal-header h2 {
            color: var(--color-cyan);
            font-size: 1.5rem;
        }
        
        .modal-close {
            background: none;
            border: none;
            color: var(--color-slate-400);
            font-size: 1.5rem;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: color 0.3s ease;
            padding: 0.5rem;
        }
        
        .modal-close:hover {
            color: var(--color-slate-200);
        }
        
        .modal-content {
            padding: 1.5rem;
        }
        
        .error-box {
            background: rgba(185, 28, 28, 0.1);
            border: 1px solid #EF4444;
            border-radius: 0.75rem;
            padding: 1.5rem;
            margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
        }
        
        .error-title {
            color: #FCA5A5;
            font-weight: 700;
            font-size: 1.125rem;
            margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
        }
        
        .error-message {
            color: #FECACA;
            font-size: 0.875rem;
        }
        
        .analysis-result {
            background: var(--color-slate-800);
            border-radius: 0.75rem;
            padding: 1.5rem;
            margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
        }
        
        .analysis-result p {
            color: var(--color-cyan);
            font-weight: 700;
            margin-bottom: 0.75rem;
        }
        
        .analysis-result ul {
            list-style: disc;
            padding-left: 2rem;
        }
        
        .analysis-result li {
            color: var(--color-slate-400);
            font-size: 0.875rem;
            margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
        }
        
        .modal-footer {
            border-top: 1px solid var(--color-slate-700);
            padding: 1.5rem;
            text-align: center;
        }
        
        .modal-quote {
            font-style: italic;
            color: var(--color-slate-400);
            font-size: 0.75rem;
            margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
        }
        
        .modal-quote-author {
            color: var(--color-slate-500);
            font-size: 0.625rem;
        }
        
        .modal-button {
            width: 100%;
            background: var(--color-slate-700);
            color: white;
            border: none;
            padding: 1rem;
            border-radius: 0.75rem;
            font-weight: 600;
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: background 0.3s ease;
            margin-top: 1rem;
        }
        
        .modal-button:hover {
            background: var(--color-slate-600);
        }
        
        /* ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
           ECOSYSTEM SECTION
           ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════ */
        
        .ecosystem-section {
            background: linear-gradient(90deg, rgba(30, 41, 59, 0.5), rgba(51, 65, 85, 0.5));
            border: 1px solid var(--color-slate-600);
            border-radius: 1rem;
            padding: 3rem;
            margin-bottom: 4rem;
        }
        
        .ecosystem-section h2 {
            font-size: 2rem;
            text-align: center;
            color: var(--color-teal);
            margin-bottom: 2rem;
        }
        
        .ecosystem-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(280px, 1fr));
            gap: 1.5rem;
            margin-bottom: 2rem;
        }
        
        .ecosystem-card {
            background: rgba(15, 23, 42, 0.5);
            border: 1px solid var(--color-slate-700);
            border-radius: 0.75rem;
            padding: 2rem;
            transition: transform 0.3s ease, border-color 0.3s ease;
        }
        
        .ecosystem-card:hover {
            transform: translateY(-5px);
            border-color: var(--color-teal);
        }
        
        .ecosystem-card h3 {
            font-size: 1.25rem;
            margin-bottom: 1rem;
        }
        
        .ecosystem-card.claimroot h3 { color: var(--color-cyan); }
        .ecosystem-card.forty-d h3 { color: var(--color-teal); }
        .ecosystem-card.vaultmesh h3 { color: var(--color-emerald); }
        
        .ecosystem-card p {
            color: var(--color-slate-300);
            font-size: 0.875rem;
            line-height: 1.6;
        }
        
        .ecosystem-attribution {
            text-align: center;
            margin-top: 2rem;
            padding-top: 2rem;
            border-top: 1px solid var(--color-slate-700);
        }
        
        .ecosystem-attribution p {
            margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
        }
        
        .architect-name {
            color: var(--color-cyan);
            font-weight: 700;
        }
        
        /* ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
           FOOTER
           ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════ */
        
        footer {
            text-align: center;
            padding: 3rem 2rem;
            margin-top: 4rem;
            border-top: 1px solid var(--color-slate-700);
        }
        
        footer p {
            color: var(--color-slate-500);
            font-size: 0.875rem;
            margin-bottom: 0.75rem;
        }
        
        .footer-links {
            color: var(--color-slate-400);
            margin-top: 1rem;
        }
        
        .footer-links span {
            margin: 0 0.5rem;
        }
        
        .footer-links .link-cyan { color: var(--color-cyan); }
        .footer-links .link-teal { color: var(--color-teal); }
        .footer-links .link-emerald { color: var(--color-emerald); }
        
        /* ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
           ANIMATIONS
           ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════ */
        
        @keyframes fadeIn {
            from {
                opacity: 0;
            }
            to {
                opacity: 1;
            }
        }
        
        @keyframes fadeInUp {
            from {
                opacity: 0;
                transform: translateY(30px);
            }
            to {
                opacity: 1;
                transform: translateY(0);
            }
        }
        
        @keyframes scaleIn {
            from {
                opacity: 0;
                transform: scale(0.9);
            }
            to {
                opacity: 1;
                transform: scale(1);
            }
        }
        
        @keyframes spin {
            to {
                transform: rotate(360deg);
            }
        }
        
        @keyframes pulse {
            0%, 100% {
                opacity: 1;
            }
            50% {
                opacity: 0.5;
            }
        }
        
        /* ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
           RESPONSIVE DESIGN
           ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════ */
        
        @media (max-width: 768px) {
            .nav-links {
                display: none;
            }
            
            .hero h1 {
                font-size: 2.5rem;
            }
            
            .metrics-grid {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr;
            }
            
            .ratio-card .metric-value {
                font-size: 3rem;
            }
            
            .ecosystem-grid {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr;
            }
        }
        
        /* ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
           UTILITY CLASSES
           ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════ */
        
        .hidden {
            display: none !important;
        }
        
        .text-center {
            text-align: center;
        }
        
        .mb-4 {
            margin-bottom: 2rem;
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>
    
    <!-- ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
         SOVEREIGN HEADER
         ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════ -->
    
    <header class="sovereign-header">

         MAIN CONTENT
         ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════ -->
    
    <main class="container">
        
        <!-- HERO SECTION -->
        <section class="hero">
            <h1>OmniGrid Sovereignty Platform</h1>
            <p class="hero-subtitle">The 33-Year Truth, Encoded in Silicon</p>
            <p class="hero-description">
                Witness the mathematical collapse of the 360-hour fiction through 
                the verified <span class="hero-highlight">68,640-hour Sovereign Baseline</span>.
            </p>
            <div class="sovereign-quote">
                <p>"Every grain counted. Zero waste. Pure innovation."</p>
                <p class="author">— Heyns (The Just)</p>
            </div>
        </section>
        
        <!-- VERDICT DASHBOARD SECTION -->
        <section id="verdict" class="verdict-dashboard">
            <h2 class="dashboard-title">📊 Sovereign Verdict Dashboard</h2>
            
            <div class="metrics-grid">
                <div class="metric-card">
                    <p class="metric-label">Verified Baseline</p>
                    <p class="metric-value baseline">68,640</p>
                    <p class="metric-description">hours (33 years)</p>
                </div>
                
                <div class="metric-card">
                    <p class="metric-label">Fictional Claim</p>
                    <p class="metric-value claimed">360</p>
                    <p class="metric-description">hours (15 days)</p>
                </div>
                
                <div class="metric-card ratio-card">
                    <p class="metric-label">Absurdity Ratio</p>
                    <p class="metric-value ratio">190.7×</p>
                    <p class="metric-description">
                        Fiction is <strong>190.7 times smaller</strong> than reality
                    </p>
                </div>
                
                <div class="metric-card" style="grid-column: 1 / -1;">
                    <p class="metric-label">Temporal Indebtedness</p>
                    <p class="metric-value indebtedness">68,280</p>
                    <p class="metric-description">
                        hours of reality unaccounted for by the fictional claim
                    </p>
                </div>
            </div>
            
            <div class="verdict-statement">
                <p>
                    The 360-hour claim is mathematically absurd. Fiction cannot displace 
                    68,640 hours of verified reality. This ratio (190.7) represents the 
                    mathematical impossibility of the fictional claim.
                </p>
            </div>
            
            <p class="verdict-timestamp">
                Verdict generated at: <span id="verdict-time"></span>
            </p>
        </section>
        
        <!-- ANT ROCK TEST SECTION -->
        <section id="ant-test" class="ant-test-section">
            <h2>🐜 The Ant Rock Test</h2>

                Attempting to move the Ant Rock (a metaphor for the 68,640-hour reality) with 
                360-hour logic will always fail. The solar collapse analysis confirms what 
                mathematics already proved: <strong>truth cannot be displaced by fiction</strong>.
            </p>
            
            <div class="test-parameters">

                    <li><strong>Ant Logic:</strong> 360-hour fictional claim</li>
                    <li><strong>Rock Reality:</strong> 68,640-hour verified baseline</li>
                    <li><strong>Expected Outcome:</strong> Logical impossibility (Ratio: 190.7)</li>
                    <li><strong>Solar Reference:</strong> Earth's orbital mechanics as metaphorical constant</li>
                </ul>
            </div>
            
            <div id="attempt-counter" class="attempt-counter hidden">
                Attempts to displace reality: <span class="attempt-count" id="attempt-count">0</span><br>
                <span style="font-size: 0.75rem; color: var(--color-slate-500);">(All attempts mathematically futile)</span>
            </div>
            
            <div class="test-button-container">
                <button id="ant-test-button" class="test-button">

                </button>
            </div>
            
            <div id="analysis-status" class="analysis-status hidden">
                <p class="step-1">Computing force vectors...</p>
                <p class="step-2">Measuring reality displacement potential...</p>
                <p class="step-3">Consulting orbital mechanics...</p>
            </div>
        </section>
        
        <!-- ECOSYSTEM SECTION -->
        <section id="ecosystem" class="ecosystem-section">

            <div class="ecosystem-grid">

    <div id="error-modal" class="modal-overlay hidden">
        <div class="modal">
            <div class="modal-header">
                <h2>⚠️ Logical Impossibility Detected</h2>
                <button class="modal-close" onclick="closeModal()">×</button>
            </div>
            
            <div class="modal-content">
                <div class="error-box">
                    <p class="error-title">Error: 360-Hour Logic Insufficient</p>
                    <p class="error-message">Ant Rock Not Moved.</p>
                </div>
                
                <div class="analysis-result">
                    <p>Analysis Result:</p>
                    <ul>
                        <li>Fiction cannot displace verified reality</li>
                        <li>Absurdity Ratio (190.7) prevents logical collapse</li>
                        <li>Solar orbital constant remains unaffected by ant-scale force</li>
                        <li>68,640 hours > 360 hours by factor of 190.7×</li>
                    </ul>
                </div>
                
                <div class="modal-footer">
                    <p class="modal-quote">
                        "The rock knows its weight. The ant knows its limits. Truth needs no motion."
                    </p>
                    <p class="modal-quote-author">— Sovereign Operational Baseline</p>
                    
                    <button class="modal-button" onclick="closeModal()">
                        Acknowledge Logical Impossibility
                    </button>

            </div>
        </div>

    <!-- ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
         JAVASCRIPT - SOVEREIGN LOGIC
         ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════ -->
    
    <script>
        // Sovereign Constants (Immutable Truth)
        const BASELINE_HOURS = 68640.0;
        const CLAIMED_HOURS = 360.0;
        const ABSURDITY_RATIO = 190.7;
        const INDEBTEDNESS_HOURS = 68280.0;
        
        // State
        let attemptCount = 0;
        
        // Initialize timestamp
        document.getElementById('verdict-time').textContent = new Date().toLocaleString();
        
        // Ant Rock Test Logic
        const testButton = document.getElementById('ant-test-button');
        const analysisStatus = document.getElementById('analysis-status');
        const attemptCounter = document.getElementById('attempt-counter');
        const attemptCountDisplay = document.getElementById('attempt-count');
        const errorModal = document.getElementById('error-modal');
        
        testButton.addEventListener('click', async function() {
            // Increment attempt count
            attemptCount++;
            attemptCountDisplay.textContent = attemptCount;
            attemptCounter.classList.remove('hidden');
            
            // Log to console (Sovereign Verification)
            console.log(`🐜 ANT ROCK TEST - Attempt #${attemptCount}`);
            console.log('📊 Analyzing: Can 360-hour logic move 68,640-hour reality?');
            
            // Disable button and show loading
            testButton.disabled = true;
            testButton.innerHTML = '<span class="loading-spinner"></span> Analyzing Solar-Ant Collapse Logic...';
            
            // Show analysis status
            analysisStatus.classList.remove('hidden');
            
            // Simulate 2-second analysis
            await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, 2000));
            
            // Hide analysis status
            analysisStatus.classList.add('hidden');
            
            // Reset button
            testButton.disabled = false;
            testButton.innerHTML = '🐜 Initiate Ant-Solar Collapse Analysis';
            
            // Show error modal
            errorModal.classList.remove('hidden');
            
            // Log result
            console.log('❌ RESULT: Logic Insufficient. Ant Rock Unmoved.');
            console.log(`   Absurdity Ratio: ${ABSURDITY_RATIO} (Fiction cannot displace truth)`);
        });
        
        // Modal close function
        function closeModal() {
            errorModal.classList.add('hidden');
        }
        
        // Close modal on Escape key
        document.addEventListener('keydown', function(event) {
            if (event.key === 'Escape') {
                closeModal();
            }
        });
        
        // Close modal on overlay click
        errorModal.addEventListener('click', function(event) {
            if (event.target === errorModal) {
                closeModal();
            }
        });
        
        // Smooth scroll for navigation links
        document.querySelectorAll('a[href^="#"]').forEach(anchor => {
            anchor.addEventListener('click', function (e) {
                e.preventDefault();
                const target = document.querySelector(this.getAttribute('href'));
                if (target) {
                    target.scrollIntoView({
                        behavior: 'smooth',
                        block: 'start'
                    });
                }
            });
        });
        
        // Log sovereign initialization
        console.log('═════════════════════════════════════════════════════════');
        console.log('🌌 OMNIGRID SOVEREIGNTY PLATFORM - INITIALIZED');
        console.log('═════════════════════════════════════════════════════════');
        console.log(`Baseline Hours: ${BASELINE_HOURS}`);
        console.log(`Claimed Hours: ${CLAIMED_HOURS}`);
        console.log(`Absurdity Ratio: ${ABSURDITY_RATIO}`);
        console.log(`Indebtedness: ${INDEBTEDNESS_HOURS} hours`);
        console.log('Domain: samfox.faa.zone');
        console.log('Architect: Heyns (The Just)');
        console.log('Philosophy: "Every grain counted. Zero waste. Pure innovation."');
        console.log('═════════════════════════════════════════════════════════');
    </script>
    
</body>
</html>
